basic.description: A study of the integration of the elements of design which together contribute to a three-dimensional environment for performance.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Scenography

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM or GNDS Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Specialization Plan) and (a grade of B- in each of DRAM200; DRAM 220; DRAM 240) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
